  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<Map.Entry<K,V>>

    public class HBaseKeyValueStateIterator<K,V>
extends BaseBinaryStateIterator<K,V>

    An iterator over HBaseKeyValueState.

        pendingPrepareIterator - The iterator of pendingPrepare

        chunkSize - The size of chunk to get entries from HBase

        valueSerializer - The serializer of value
